info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:25AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Stephenson County through 430 AM CDT... At 323 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mount Carroll to Pecatonica. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms with some areas near to just north of Freeport having received 2 inches of rain already. An additional inch is possible with these storms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Freeport, Pearl City, German Valley, Ridott, Kent, Albertus Airport, Bolton and Stephenson County Fairgrounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
